remarks: Rule used to change the bound variable in an existential quantifier with implicit substitution.  Deduction form.  (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
statement:
cbvaldva.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = y ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
cbvexdva $p |- ( ph -> ( E. x ps <-> E. y ch ) ) $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps y $.
